flawed_nl_solution:
Her hair was 24" long and she cut half off so she cut 24/2 = <<24/2=12>>12 inches
Her hair was 24" long and she cut 12" off so she has 24-12 = <<24-12=13>>13 inches left
She has 13" of hair and lets it grow 4 more inches for a total of 13+4 = <<13+4=17>>17 inches
She has 17" and cuts off 2 more inches which leaves her hair 17-2 = <<17-2=15>>15 inches long
#### 15

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 13. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
